images.alt_text: AI-selected This image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing beautiful beaches and a relaxing atmosphere.
AI-selected These images will showcase top places in Thailand, including cultural landmarks and vibrant beach scenes, appealing to the adventurous and inviting tone of the campaign.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn
assetRequirements.content_context: A picturesque beach scene in Thailand showcasing warm weather, palm trees, and inviting waters, reflecting the autumn season.

assetRequirements.purpose: highlight top places to visit in Thailand
assetRequirements.content_context: Images of landmarks such as Wat Arun and the Chatuchak market, emphasizing cultural richness and vibrant local life.
Visuals of people enjoying Thai massages, tropical fruits, and beach lounging to evoke a sense of relaxation and vacation.

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Погрузитесь в осенний рай Таиланда!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing beautiful beaches and a relaxing atmosphere.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
